readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You didn't learn this reading for 狩 yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

When <vocabulary>hunting</vocabulary> make sure you know where the water <reading>chu</reading>tes (しゅ) are located. You'll need to use those chutes to move quickly during the hunt.
